string-array.name: cc_Instructions
string-array.item: in a small bowl, mix together the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, and baking powder
microwave the chocolate chip for 20 seconds or until melted
in a large bowl, mix together the egg, vegetable oil, the melted chocolate
add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients
grease a round cake pan and pour the mixture to it
put the pan in the oven and let it bake for about 20 minutes

string-array.name: cc_notes
string-array.item: to make sure that the chocolate does not burn microwave it 5 seconds at a time
check if the cake is cooked by using a stick
reheat 1/2 cup of nutella and pour it on the cake for extra chocolaty flavor
dust the cake with powder sugar for decoration

string-array.name: pa_instructions
string-array.item: put the uncooked pasta in a pot with the oil and (1/2 tbsp) salt and let it boil for 15 minutes
in a medium pan, add the cream , garlic powder, pinch of salt and pepper, and the italian herbs and let it cook in medium heat
once the pasta is cooked, drain the water and add the cooked pasta to the sauce
put the parmesan to the sauce and mix
turn off the heat and put the pasta in a serving dish

string-array.name: pa_notes
string-array.item: add mozzarella cheese for more cheesy texture and taste

string-array.name: ft_instructions
string-array.item: in a bowl that is big enough to fit the toast mix the egg, milk, salt, and pepper
dip the toast in the mixture
grease a pan with butter or any type of oil, and put the toast
once the toast is golden and crispy take it off the pan
drizzle the toast with maple syrup

string-array.name: ft_notes
string-array.item: sprinkle with powder sugar for more sweetness
if there is still mixture left you can cook one more toast
you can eat it with cream cheese or nutella as well
